summary: A young man finds solace with a young woman, his mother, and a high-school football coach who recruits him to quarterback a six-man team.
cast: Ryan Gosling|David Morse|Clea DuVall|David Cale|Eddie Spears|Kelly Lynch|Amy Adams|Ken White|Noah Watts|Kim DeLong|Geraldine Keams|Douglas Sebern|Cody Harvey|Melkon Andonian|J.P. Gabriel|Chris Offutt|John Henry Marshall|Juliana F. Clayton|Volley Reed|H.A. Smith|Michael Mahony|Alison Tatlock|Betty Ann Conard|Michael Dunlap|Wylie Gustafson|Perle Weissman|David Wiater|Tim Boggs|Matt Cornelius|Nate McClure|Matt Pipinich|Paul Pipinich|Jesse Sidor|Michael Smart|Ben Snipes|Miles Gravage|Philip Heron|Karlee Jane
keywords: football coach|cheerleader|mother son relationship|father son relationship|loss of father
director: Directors: Alex Smith, Andrew J. Smith
title: Tiro de gracia
